content:
What a lovely gesture! A thoughtfully curated gift basket for baby Sophia and her parents will surely be appreciated. Here are some cute and practical items to consider including:

**Clothing and Accessories:**

1. Adorable onesies or baby bodysuits (neutral colors or with cute designs)
2. Soft, cozy socks or booties
3. A sweet baby hat or headband
4. A set of baby-sized washcloths or a soft, plush towel
5. A tiny pair of baby mittens or gloves

**Baby Care Essentials:**

1. A set of gentle, fragrance-free baby wash and lotion
2. A baby oil or moisturizer for skin care
3. A soft-bristled baby brush or comb
4. A set of baby cotton pads or rounds
5. A baby thermometer (digital or pacifier-style)

**Feeding and Snacking:**

1. A set of baby bottles or a breast pump (if you're close to Michael's family)
2. A pacifier or two (if they plan to use them)
3. A baby food storage container or a set of baby spoons
4. A few baby-friendly snacks like puffs or teething crackers

**Playtime and Comfort:**

1. A soft, plush toy or a set of rattles
2. A baby blanket or a lightweight, cozy throw
3. A set of baby books or board books
4. A baby music toy or a set of baby-safe mirrors

**Personalized Touches:**

1. A personalized baby blanket or onesie with Sophia's name or initials
2. A baby journal or milestone card set for Michael and his family to track Sophia's growth
3. A heartfelt card or note with your congratulations and well-wishes

**Other Ideas:**

1. A gift card to a baby store or online retailer, so Michael and his family can choose what they need
2. A meal delivery or gift card to a meal delivery service, to help during the new-parent adjustment period
3. A relaxing or pampering gift for Michael and his partner, like a scented candle or a spa gift certificate

Remember to consider Michael's family's preferences and values when selecting items for the gift basket. You can also include a thoughtful note or card to make the gift even more special.
